where PSP_TASK_NO = #{pspTaskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select:
select p.* from psp_check_task p where 1=1 and rownum < 10
and cus_Name like concat(concat('%',#{cusName,jdbcType=CHAR}),'%')
and cus_Id like concat(concat('%',#{cusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and cus_mng_Id like concat(concat('%',#{cusMngId,jdbcType=CHAR}),'%')
and cus_mng_name like concat(concat('%',#{cusMngName,jdbcType=CHAR}),'%')
and psp_Task_No like concat(concat('%',#{pspTaskNo,jdbcType=CHAR}),'%')
and cus_Type like concat(concat('%',#{cusType,jdbcType=CHAR}),'%')
and crt_Date like concat(concat('%',#{crtDate,jdbcType=CHAR}),'%')
and chk_Type like concat(concat('%',#{chkType,jdbcType=CHAR}),'%')
mapper.insert:
insert into Psp_Check_Task
psp_Task_No,
cus_Id,
cus_Name,
cus_Mng_Name,
cus_Mng_Id,
chk_Type,
cus_Type,
crt_Date,
#{pspTaskNo},
#{cusId},
#{cusName},
#{cusMngName},
#{cusMngId},
#{chkType},
#{cusType},
#{crtDate},
mapper.update:
update psp_check_task p
p.psp_task_no = #{pspTaskNo},
p.cus_id = #{cusId},
cus_name = #{cusName},
cus_mng_name = #{cusMngName},
cus_mng_id = #{cusMngId},
crt_Date = #{crtDate},
where p.psp_task_no = #{pspTaskNo}
